law.catch_line: Except as provided in §§ 10-I(f) and 10J(c) of this article and Title 11, Subtitle 2 and § 9-1607...
law.text:
Except as provided in §§ 10-I(f) and 10J(c) of this article and Title 11, Subtitle 2 and § 9-1607 of the Land Use Article, and notwithstanding any other provision of law to the contrary, in St. Mary's County, the County Commissioners may provide that:
Violations of county ordinances and resolutions shall be punishable as misdemeanors and enforced in the same manner and to the same extent as municipal violations under Article 23A, § 3(a) of the Code; and
Violations of county ordinances shall be prosecuted in the same manner and to the same extent as set forth for municipal infractions in Article 23A, § 3(b) of the Code.
